modes.content: Pandharpur is well connected by road. Pune is approx 204 km and Mumbai is approx 386 km away. Bijapur (100 km) and Solapur (74 km) are nearby cities with direct connectivity.
Nearest railway stations are Kurdwadi (50 km) and Solapur (74 km). Both stations are well connected with major cities like Mumbai, Pune, Bangalore, Chennai, Delhi, and Hyderabad.
Nearest domestic airport is Pune (204 km). From Pune, Pandharpur can be reached by road or via train through Solapur or Kurdwadi.
